Name: Goody-Goody
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin, lemon and Chartreuse. Not to everybody's taste.
History: In W.J. Tarling's 1937 'Café Royal Cocktail Book Coronation Edition' the invention of this cocktail is credited to G. Bongarzoni.
Nutrition: One serving of Goody-Goody contains 208 calories
